publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 3
ab.l:
T́oš́agiń üśt́uńa keč́aĺar byla izĺadim ńeki śuvd́u
ǯanym izĺadim any da tapamadym any.
Turajim ėńdi da quršajim šaharda da bazarlarda da oramlarda izĺajim ńeki śuvd́u ǯanym izĺadim any da tapmadym any.
Taptylar ḿeni ol saqlavčular Moše da Aharon ol quršavčular šaharda sordum ńeki śuvd́u ǯanym ḱord́ujuźmo.
Azɣyna ki aštym alardan ńegińč́a ki taptym ńeki śuvd́u ǯanym tuttum any da jeb́erḿadim any ńeginč́a ki keĺtirdim any üv́uńa anamnyn da ḥuǯurasyna t́oŕav́č́umńuń.
Ant ėt́tiŕamiń siźni qyzlary Jerušalajimniń jurĺari byla hem oĺeńĺari byla ol t́uźńuń ėǵer ojatsejyz da ėǵer qozɣasajyz ol śuv́arlikni ńegińč́a ki öźu kĺagej.
Kim bu keĺadi midbardan baɣanalary bylakibik t́ut́uńńuń t́ut́a- tiĺǵań mušk da ĺevona bar otjamyndan otjamčynyn.
Muna t́oš́agi ki Šelomonun altymyš baɣatyrlar č́uvŕa anar baɣatyrlaryndan Jiśra- ʾeĺniń.
Barlary tutuvčular qylyč čynyḥtyrylɣanlar č́eriv́ǵa kišiniń qylyčy butu üśt́uńa qorḥuvundan keč́aĺarniń.
Č́eb́ar saraj ki ol- dur b́et́ hamikdaš qyldy öźuńa ol bij Šelomo aɣačlaryndan ol Ĺevanonnun.
Baɣanalary qyldy ḱuḿuš́ t́oš́avi altyn atlanmaɣy anyn ipkiń ortasy t́oš́aĺǵań śuv́arlik byla ėśni qojmaɣy byla qorḥuv- čularnyn T́eńrid́ań.
Čyɣyjyz da ḱoŕujuź ėj qyzlary Cijonnun bijni Šelomonu ki taǯlady any anasy toju vaḥtynda da bijanči vaḥtynda üŕaginiń.
